params.initialLiquidity: Amount of collateral to seed the AMM with
params.question: The question/description for the market

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.market: Address of the market to pause

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.market: Address of the market to unpause

createMarket(string,string[],uint256,uin.notice: Create a new prediction market with an AMM

marketCount().notice: Get total number of markets created

pauseMarket(address).notice: Pause a specific market and its AMM (emergency only)

unpauseMarket(address).notice: Unpause a specific market and its AMM
